author: {'steamid': '76561198060528572', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 7693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1511, 'last_played': 1707470285}
review:
I simply cannot decide whether I shall recommend the game or not.
The content of the game is extremely limited. but it is kind of fun in its own way. The game feels like a mini game in a normal game. Lots of improvements needed.

 I would like to give you just a few examples out of many of the basic mechanics that the game is missing.

 You cannot report or vote a player out and the private rooms have only two digit passwords. So basically anyone can enter your game with trial and error and stay there if they like to. Imagine you are at a very high wave and someone comes  in and blocks your vision on purpose the whole game (This actually happened)

No sense of achievement. The whole point of the game  is to clear waves and reach to a wave as high as you can. But you cannot even unlock any achievements or get any rewards  for the waves you reached. The game gives you no motivation to progress further. All you do is to get in kill a few orcs and get out.

All the waves are basically the same. 4 types of enemies, Orc, wywern, giant and a dragon . As you progress, only the number of creatures and the their health go up.

No friendlist or any other way to keep contact with the players you played on public. No statistics at all, so you essentially have no idea what other players are up to. I mean nothing promotos you to do more than shooting a few arrows and leaving the game anyway. So that is not a suprise.


Imagine a very basic java game you played on browser. This game is at the same exact level but on vr. I cannot argue base of the game is fun but as I said. let alone any complicated or any advanced mechanics, this game is lacking the most basics.
developer_response:
Hi!

Thank you for your feedback. 
We are sorry, you're not quite happy with Elven Assassin. 

Please note that our game is still in early access and we are making every effort to develop it. In the future, we want to add more maps and with them more content. There’ll be more mechanics like new catapults, challenging enemies, and maps for up to eight players! 

Also you have mentioned problems with two digit passwords. We will discuss this issue with the team. 

Achievements, for now, are more about shooting than reaching a certain point in the game, but we will also discuss this. 

Please consider checking back the game one day and share with us your current opinion.

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

review: It's a rather simple game in concept, and in practice really. The maps have 4 towers and can have up to 4 players per map, though players can share towers and you defend a gate from a never ending horde of orcs using a bow and arrow with some magic thrown in for good measure. I rather enjoy the game, and if you play long enough it can by quite a workout constantly ducking to avoid axes that have been thrown at you. I highly recommend it, even though it's simple, it's a lot of fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041925998', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 3825, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1850, 'last_played': 1688671770}
review: Игра проста, классика жанра. Идут волны врагов, чтобы захватить вашу крепость, а вы пытаетесь ее защитить. Всего-навсего бегут орки из крупных пикселей, летят такие же зернистые драконы. Но что-то не дает оторваться, заставляет заходить снова и снова. Разумеется, вне виртуальной реальности и половины интереса бы не было. А так - в ваших руках лук, тетиву надо натягивать, от летящих топоров уворачиваться, от дракона можно сбежать на другую башню, если не успеешь его расстрелять. И с каждой волной нападающих, становится все жарче. Вентилятора в шлеме не хватает!

author: {'steamid': '76561198129746034', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 384, 'last_played': 1575716248}
review:
VR방에서 대표적으로 하는 활쏘는 게임
.
.
.
.
인데 이 게임 비번 설정이 최대 2자리라서
몇개만 치면 VR방에서 만든방 바로 뚫힘

VR방에서 잠시 하면 별로 잘 못쏘지만,
집에서 조금만 해보면 VR 방에서 처음하는사람들 정도는 다 썰고 다닐수 있음
대부분 VR방이 마이크가 열려 있어서 말하는게 다 들리는데 그래서
실시간으로 반응을 즐기면서 뉴비들 학살하는 이렇게 재밌는 게임이 또 없음.
방금도 29킬 0뎃 하면서 재밌게 했음 ㅎ

author: {'steamid': '76561198135534515', 'num_games_owned': 204, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1635598849}
review: Its an amazing game, don't get me wrong. But its just lacking content. It has some bows and helmets that I was grinding for but then I realized that they dont even do anything. All the helmets and bows are the same. Atleast make the bows do more damage and have some kind of passive abilities or something. Its also lacking in maps and enemies. It just kinda gets boring playing the same 3 maps with the same 2 enemies over and over again. Feels like the devs just abandoned the game and don't bother to make any content updates.
developer_response:
Hi!

Thank you for your comment. 
We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the amount of content available in the game, but we have good news for you! 

The game has received an update with better visuals and performance, more-stable networking and more since you posted the review so maybe you might want to give it a second chance. 

If that doesn't satisfy you, I can tell you that we are planning even more maps and interesting content in the future. 
Consider checking the game one day and share with us your current opinion.

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198372014096', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1574261680}
review: Cheap feel and the physics of the arrows are clunky and wrong. Not a very fun game, but the idea is great fun.
developer_response:
Hi!

Thank you for your opinion. 
Sorry to hear that the game physics did not match your expectations. 

If you could provide us with more information on what you feel was wrong with the bow/aiming mechanic we would be happy. That way we can improve in the future. 

Also, have you tried the "Arrow offset" option from in-game settings? That can help you with the bow handling.

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198211560437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1578586502}
review:
장점 : 운동이 된다. 왼팔이 강해진다
          정교한 컨트롤이 가능해 자신이 한조가 된 기분이다.
          힘들지만 재미가 있다
           멀티플레이어가 가능하며 전세계인들과 같이 한조기분을 낼수있다.
           업그레이드 왕창하면 무진장 재밌을거 같다

단점 : 힘들다, 좀만하면 왼팔에 근육통이 온다
          업그레이드하기 위해 필요한 돈 벌이가 너무 힘들다 싱글 한판에 30원정도 준다 업글에 1000원~10000원 이 필요하다
          싱글플레이어는 혼자 못해먹겠다 너무힘들고 어렵다
          하는 사람이 적어 멀티가 잘 안잡힌다. 그나마 있는 멀티플레이어들은 비번방으로 지들끼리만 논다.

review: Bonjour, ce jeu est très bien mais il serait encore mieux si, dans la version finale, vous prévoyiez la possibilité de se téléporter sur un ou plusieurs spots devant les portes pour affronter les monstres en changeant d'armes (de l'arc vers épée/bouclier et toutes sortes d'armes de melée ou d'hast. Et il faut absolument garder le mode de déplacement par téléportation : pas de déplacement avec le joystik, on reste sur son spot et on fait face ou on prend l'arc et on file se cacher sur une tour !

author: {'steamid': '76561198972361727', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3089, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1691364931}

author: {'steamid': '76561198024693716', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1581621372}
review:
Game was abandoned. Devs don't respond.

On top of that there is only 4 (badly balanced) levels, full of bugs (arrows fly through enemies not triggering a hit e.g.) and takes wayyyyyyyyyyy to long to level up and skill - which is super boring with just 4 levels!

Valve Index is not supported.
Yes, you can play a beta branch for Index but 
1) that will not work for multiplayer (totally empty and you can't play together with people on the normal build) and
2) you can't open your spell menu to cast skills!

Avoid. There is better bow games out there.
developer_response:
Hi!

Thank you for that comment. 
We apologize for the late response. 

We feel sorry that you are not completely satisfied with our game, but I have good news for you. Since you wrote this comment a bit has changed. Valve index is already supported and the spell menu is working properly. Moreover, we changed visuals, improved performance, and made networking more stable.

Also, we plan to add more maps, enemies and mechanics in the future. 
If you want to see a little preview of what will get into the game, check out the Elven Assassin profile on Facebook.

Maybe you can give Elven Assassin a second chance?

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198053298358', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 7599, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1707060490}
review:
Была отличная игра, почувствовать себя лучником. Дети были в восторге. Однако после последних обновлений играть на Valve Index стало не возможно, контроллеры в игре не определяются. Разработчики молчат. Теперь этой игре ставлю минус.

It was a great game, to feel like an archer. The children were delighted. However, after the latest updates, it became impossible to play on the Valve Index, the controllers in the game are not determined. The developers are silent. Now I put a minus to this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198819752429', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1573627509}
review:
Solid game, feels good like the archery level from The Lab.  The graphics look great outside of VR, but they're pretty hokey looking in-game.  Dodging stuff isn't my idea of fun either, but I can live with it.

There's a little bit of visual glitching with my Windows Mixed Reality headset (Samsung Odyssey), and this type of game is basically the only thing that Windows MR's tracking sucks for, so I'm going to have to hold off until I pick up an Index or the tracking gear I need for my Pimax before I can really enjoy this game to the fullest.  I'm still glad I bought this though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004149303', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1570396299}
review:
Yes... but only just
Good environment and use of VR
But needs balancing.  The controls are the RiftS are too inconsistent and many arrows never 'sit' right.

Then with the incoming axes it's literally impossible to move out the way.  It takes 1.5 seconds for you to reliably fire an arrow to move, but 1.49 seconds for the axe to hit you, even with fast reflexes I get hit 90% of the time rendering that level a failure.

Good work, but needs a few tweaks, will play in future for sure

author: {'steamid': '76561198021821779', 'num_games_owned': 2060, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1569857811}
review: Feels very cheap, single death animations that get repeated over and over. Bow and Arrow mechanic doesn't feel bad but still worse than the free minigame in the lab
developer_response:
Hi!

Sorry to hear you didn't quite like the game. 

Could you tell us what you think was wrong with the bow mechanics? Are there any things which you didn’t like that we can make better? We'd be very grateful. 

We also recommend trying the multiplayer mode, which offers co-op and more dynamic PvP deathmatch. 

Also, have you tried the "Arrow offset" option from in-game settings? That can help you with the bow handling.

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198303238062', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 705, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 657, 'last_played': 1585316770}

author: {'steamid': '76561197976350327', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 14776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 994, 'last_played': 1613286657}
review: I've been playing Quivr a lot over the last couple years and started playing Elven Assassin about 6 weeks ago.  I think the bow mechanics are a little better in Quivr but are pretty similar.  The plot of the game in Elven Assassin is much simpler and easier to grasp for new players which has led to a larger number of new players in Assassin and a more vibrant multiplayer community in my opinion.  Quivr has a lot more variety in terms of landscapes, enemies, and boss subplots, but Assassin's base play just seems more satisfying to me,  maybe just because I've grown a little bored of Quivr.  Bottom line is that if you like Quivr, you will probably like Assassin and vice versa.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067861938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 420, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 419, 'last_played': 1586574392}
review: 10/10 replay value. I have great fun playing this. I actually get a little bit of exercise doing so, this is a game everyone with a VR headset should own. Strong player base and everyone is very cool. I would rate this game 9/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089354048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4420, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 437, 'last_played': 1688183073}
review:
I'm a big fan.   It's a great horde mode game, where you fight off ever increasing waves of angry orcs.   As more and more show up, they begin throwing things and fighting back.  That would be enough to be worth the money spent,, but the game also allows you to get spells and increase your damage as you level up.   Another great feature is the multiplayer.   The game was really meant for several people to work together, and consequently seems to be a game that a lot of people enjoy in VR arcades.  Eventually you will want to join multi player online groups to increase your levels, and it's fun to randomly come across people in VR arcade groups experiencing the game for the first time.   Enjoy, and don't forget about your spells, the make a difference!

Pros:  fun, easy to get started, great multi player, good shoulder workout

Cons: glitchy at high levels,  good shoulder workout

author: {'steamid': '76561198074109030', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1048, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1671912300}
review:
Отличная игра. tower defense -   с некоторыми ньюансами. 
Игрок должен отражать волны орков стреляя из лука. Есть только лук и немного заклинаний. 
Стрельба из лука выполнена на отлично. Маст хев в коллекцию.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073357740', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1566106111}
review: Waste of $15. There are only 3 maps to play on. After about 5 waves of enemies, the waves become insanely difficult and make the game not playable. Not much in terms of customization (some apparel, spells for your arrows). Multiplayer is extremely buggy and lag everywhere (what did I expect from an online VR game though...) I recommend you check out the Portal spin-off "The Lab" vr game. A minigame contained therein is, in my opinion, a better, cleaner looking/feeling version of this. If you enjoy that, then maybe consider this game. However I still prefer that free portal version over this $15 downgrade.
developer_response:
Hi!

Thank you for your opinion. 
We're sorry you're not happy with Elven Assassin. 

We wanted to say that the game has changed a bit since your comment was issued.  We have upgraded visuals, enhanced performance, and networking has been improved. 

In addition, we plan to add more maps and mechanics to the game soon. We hope that you will check our game one day after our next content updates and share with us your current opinion.

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198871651834', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 56528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 979, 'playtime_at_review': 7632, 'last_played': 1712422669}

review:
L'arc est très bien représenté, la sensation de tirer la corde est bien simulée. Le mode multijoueur est particulièrement plaisant.
Les graphismes pourraient être améliorés, mais cela est normal pour un jeu sorti en 2016. Cela ne gène en rien l'expérience VR.
Très bon jeu de tir à l'arc!

author: {'steamid': '76561197981746128', 'num_games_owned': 283, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 503, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1647651548}

review: Archery works really well in VR and this game has pretty good archery. I wasn't compelled to spend much more than an hour in it, but I enjoyed that time and could imagine playing more if I had friends that were interested in the game. Multiplayer is pretty much the way to play. It's popular enough that you can get match-made with random players. If you're looking for a horde-based wave shooter with archery, this is probably the best one one on the market.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052353402', 'num_games_owned': 637, 'num_reviews': 860, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1562096870}
review:
It's a relatively old archery VR game, that didn't age well. The Lab has way better Longbow minigame, and it's free.

Pros:
+ Online MP's players base is still surprisingly big
+ Controller's feedback for bowstring drawing is one of the best out there

Cons:
- Visuals are horrible, they are bad even for 2016 VR
- Bow overall handling is a bit clunky. I didn't test it enough to understand what exactly is wrong with it, but it doesn't feel as responsive as in The Lab, In Death, Sacralith or many other games with better archery
- Very little content after almost 3 years of Early Access
developer_response:
Hi!

Thank you for your opinion! 

Since you published the comment, we have improved visuals, performance, and network stability. 

When it comes to using the bow, maybe you should try to adjust the "arrow hand offset" option.

As for the content, we have good news for you! New maps will be added to the game, which can accommodate up to eight players. Along with them, new interesting mechanics will be added to refresh the game. Stay tuned!

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198006265017', 'num_games_owned': 210, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1559512361}
review: I started this when it first came out and while it was a cool idea, but it was a game before its release and it had a lot of issues.  Now it is quite a bit more polished, has achievements, and is all in all a much better experience.   The graphics are clean, the movement is straight forward and the gameplay is addicting.  Granted it is hard to hold your arm up for that long even without holding up any weight.  All in all a fun game and works great on the oculus rift.

author: {'steamid': '76561198433446350', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 12484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2107, 'last_played': 1658952305}
review: Just love this game. Played it once at an Arcade center, and bought us 2 VR systems to play it at home in Co-op ! It's a simple setup so you can just start playing it without any instructions. Yet as you fight yourself throughout the waves of attacks, it gets more and more difficult, keeping you challenged. And as you gather skills & gold by playing the game, you get better armour & weapons, and you're able to reach higher levels. It's a great workout as well - both for your arms as you're shooting the arrows, and for your legs as you duck for projectiles thrown at you. It's just such fun to play, really recommend it !

author: {'steamid': '76561198132597582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 688, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 471, 'last_played': 1641173470}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025477293', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 1463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 826, 'last_played': 1696157379}
review:
이 게임을 하고 내가 하고싶은 일이 어떤 것인지 다시한번 진지하게 생각하게 만든 게임이다.
역시 아직도 고민이다. 활쟁이가 되어 한조의 경지까지 오를지 아니면 하던 것을 계속 할 지에 대해 여전히 깊이 생각하고 있다.
꿈이 한조의 경지에 오르는 것이라면 이 게임을 강력추천을 한다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172669861', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 532, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 532, 'last_played': 1540088482}
review:
I borrowed HTC Vive from a friend to try out VR games and was pleasantly surprised with this one.

Yes, there are big games like Skyrim VR or Fallout VR but Elven Assassin was the most fun to play.  And obviously it was most popular title among friends on improvised VR party.

Recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198274233605', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1131, 'last_played': 1597544228}
review: EA was one of the first games I purchased for the VR experience & I love it. The bow mechanics are very good & it gives you're arms a decent work out. The multi-player PvE is where the game really shines, you & up to 3 other players defend a town/village/castle against waves of orcs, ogres, drakes & the occasional dragon. Highly recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198197627261', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 13142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7050, 'last_played': 1664373259}
review:
Fantastic game.  Always my first choice.  Fun solo but exponentially more fun coop or pvp.  The community is great also.
Easy game to get into.  I can't recomend it enough.

review: 一款难度不高的射箭游戏，有冰箭有火箭，有PVE,PVP模式。每天签到给20金币，打怪给的钱多一些就好了。出中文版就更好了，一起联机耍的可以加Q群857725523。

author: {'steamid': '76561197992761930', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1547622241}
review:
It's fun for a bit. Then you realize it's a never-ending, one-dimensional repeat of those first few minutes.

For comparison, I had more fun with The Lab's archery world than this game, and that was free.
developer_response:
Hi!

Thank you for your feedback. 

We are currently working on making the gameplay more interesting. We are planning to add new maps and unique mechanics related to them. 
Is there anything you would like to see in the game? We would be very grateful if you would share your ideas! 

Also, we recommend trying the multiplayer mode, where you can choose between co-op and more dynamic PvP deathmatch.

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198087773843', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 493, 'last_played': 1637723758}
review: This game is great. Also, it has PVP!!! The pvp is very good once you get the hang of the concept. Although the game isn't fully released, there is a ton on content and i'm very excited to see what direction the game will go next.  I play on carpet and my knees have some rug burn now due to the pvp.   10/10 gonna go play some more!

author: {'steamid': '76561198289132083', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1624768672}
review:
Установил сегодня эту игру. Поиграл немного...)) Ну как "немного"..))) Просто не мог оторваться!)))
Игра офигительнейшая!!!! Просто супер суперовский!!!! И графика, и геймплей! И режим мультиплеер! Все просто СУПЕР-СУПЕРОВСКИЙ!!!!
Очень и очень рекомендую!!! 
Настолько реалистичный геймплей, что просто улет полный! А насколько она динамичная! Это тоже огромный супер! Такой фитнес! Афигеть просто!
Играть всем!)) Нехватает бойцов на поле боя!)))))

author: {'steamid': '76561198822401357', 'num_games_owned': 497, 'num_reviews': 221, 'playtime_forever': 1862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 675, 'last_played': 1616300898}
review:
At this time I cannot recommend due to the fact that the game is super repetitive. There are only a couple of types of enemies, and couple of arenas. Super dull when compared to Quiver or other archery games.

Edit 9/14/2022 -  This game has the potential. The devs have added maps and PVP is fantastic. It is fun to play, and if on sale, worth picking up. If the devs keep adding maps, especially PVP maps, it will make this game a "must have". Until then, worth picking up on sale.
developer_response:
Thank you for your comment.

We are planning to improve the game as the development is not yet finished. We will be adding a new location in the future in order to multiply the gameplay scenarios.

We hope that one day you'll come back, try the game once again and share with us your opinion.

Best regards,
Greg, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561197971019162', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7518, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3517, 'last_played': 1705765292}

author: {'steamid': '76561198022130750', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 961, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 440, 'last_played': 1703191017}

For a play in EU zone, add me as a friend ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198196753358', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1544989414}
review: Dla mnie gra jest nuda. Ciągle dzieje się to samo. Mało urozmaicenia. Już lepszy jest ten łuk z The Lab, gdzie przynajmniej można strzelać do wybuchających beczek lub smoły. Spodziewałem się czegoś lepszego niż strzelania w kółko do takich samych przeciwników.
developer_response:
Dziękujemy za Twoją opinię.

Masz racje, przydałoby się dodać więcej interaktywnych elementów. Uwzględnimy Twoje uwagi przy następnym planowaniu nowych funkcji. 

Jeśli masz jeszcze jakieś sugestie, nie wahaj się ich do nas zgłosić.

Zachęcamy do sprawdzenia Elven Assassin w przyszłości raz jeszcze i podzielenia się z nami Twoją opinią.

Pozdrowienia,
Grzegorz, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198062833187', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1546552754}
review: This game is really cool to play but really repetitive, upgrades are way too simple and unfortunately it's not really at the same level as many other games of this type. I would suggest you spend your money on the game Quivr rather than this once, it is more developped as has wayyy better controls and gameplay.
developer_response:
Thank you for your comment.

Can you tell us what do you mean by saying that upgrades are way too simple? Is it that the spells are too simple or there is not enough equipment? The game is in early access and we are still improving it. 

Best regards,
Greg, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198089041696', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1569202755}
review:
Pretty damn good. It's clear what you're getting, there's a decent amount of variability, it's easy for new people to get into, and it's pretty annoyance-sensitive (with ways to easily reset the view for example, which is a godsend)

Fun to blast through a bunch of waves or let a friend new to VR do so

author: {'steamid': '76561198828479958', 'num_games_owned': 231, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1552966913}

author: {'steamid': '76561198059744972', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1682159509}
review:
Clunky controls,

Moving between towers should be a button press, not shotting an arrow at it
developer_response:
Hello,

Thank you for your comment.

You are right - it indeed may be hard to get used to it. 

We decided to go with this mechanic because it's more dynamic and it fits the gameplay in our opinion.

Consider giving it another try, maybe one day it will become more common for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026986020', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1546410954}
review: The first fun tower defense game I've played on VR. The waves of orcs and stuff is cool. Only thing I can say I didn't like was the guidance by the game. The "dodging" of the thrown-axes is something I had to figure out after dying 10 times. The spells didn't specify which thumbstick they were on until you tried using the left hand remote. Overall it's a great game. Multiplayer was helarious. Would recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198815208494', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1449, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 713, 'last_played': 1704142559}
review: В начале игра не слишком зашла, когда оттачивал своё умение в соло, игра довольно быстро наскучила, но всё меняет мультиплеер! В мультиплеере играется совсем по другому. Когда играешь с другими игроками ты прям чувствуешь эту командную работу. Как от твоей точности зависит пройдёте вы очередную волну или нет, и если пропустил орка то товарищи тебя подстрахуют. В общем рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561198029260043', 'num_games_owned': 395, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1566915316}
review:
Fun and solid archery/tower defense game with good bow & arrow mechanics.
Could use more modes & overall content, but for the price its worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991918501', 'num_games_owned': 338, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1544397521}

author: {'steamid': '76561198014621099', 'num_games_owned': 306, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1552195648}
review: This game is going in the right directions and anyone who thinks VR doesn't give you a workout should play this.  The first time I played for 15 minutes and my arms were sore from the virutal arrows.  This is a good indicator where VR could go for gaming.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961199872', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 593, 'last_played': 1704050892}

author: {'steamid': '76561198003827971', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2, 'last_played': 1541448582}

author: {'steamid': '76561198031154970', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1542009097}
review:
This game is very fun to play with friends. It has a nice setting and pretty good mechanics. It is also priced very well, especially when on sale!

I believe the game lacks a form of progression and customization. It features buyable cosmetic items but they require many hours of gameplay to purchase and only cosmetic.

I also very much like the spell trees and their mechanics. A poison tree would fit in very nicely.

Fun game! Reccommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198002571564', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6921, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2478, 'last_played': 1709431451}
review: Great game.  I have 6-7 games and spend most of my time playing this game. Fun to play online multiplayer or single player. Spells are cool, I hope they develop some new element trees in the future. I wish the better armors and bows would give you more damage or armor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006244199', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 10003, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6874, 'last_played': 1658083854}

author: {'steamid': '76561198129160210', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1540520820}

Hello,

Thank you for your opinion. 

We would love to know if there are some things we could add or change to improve the gameplay. If you have any ideas you could share with us, feel free to do that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020137546', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1671592606}
review: Wow! This game is truly awesome!  I have almost 200 paid-for games (and countless free ones) and I'd thought I was unlikely to find any more that could grab my attention. This one has! I could play this all day, especially in multiplayer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198201930728', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3029, 'last_played': 1670431532}
review:
After playing the default archery game included with the Vive, I was looking for something different. QuiVR was recommended on various places as the best archery game, but for me it is rather boring.
I keep coming back to Elven Assassin and love it. It's my favoruite VR game for a couple of weeks and I just tried the multiplayer mode for the first time. 
Looking forward to more maps at some point, also being able to heal the gate would be great! It's an early access game, it's not perfect, yet. But still, it is absolutely awesome and definitely the best archery game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198857133187', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16813, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5286, 'last_played': 1663442419}
review: This is my favorite game to play on the HTC Vive.  PVP is great, but teaming up with others is even better.  Good graphics and frequent updates.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962214787', 'num_games_owned': 292, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1536264427}

author: {'steamid': '76561198818321533', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 88014, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 192, 'playtime_at_review': 18025, 'last_played': 1711665907}
review:
Buy this game now and your fun begins!!   For you gals, some of the best players are the ladies.

This is the VR game I play for multiple reasons:  Terror; Immersion; Exercise; and, fun with other people.  
I scream with agony when killed by an axe from an Orc---the immersion is so real.  In the co-op game, you really feel a part of a team effort.  Others rely on you and I count on others as they revive me when I become the dead “Axe Collector” or the ashen “Dragon’s Toast.”

We own 25 VR games.  This is always the one we turn to first. It is a workout and is flat out addictive.  Additionally, besting my husband is great fun.

The bow mechanics are great and practice makes perfect. If you see bad reviews by players who invested an hour or two---ignore them—they died quickly and soured because they did not have the needed skills.  Go read reviews by EagleEye, Gusphan, Lunalove, and Permanoob; and, hope to get to play with those magnificent Orc killers. 

I was never a gamer until now. When first introduced to this game, I died a great deal; it was enormous fun, but death was just around the corner. After 3 elven Assassin games, I requested my own computer, headset, and Steam account. Now, I play for 2 to 3 hours at time and keep coming back for more fun.  

Besides the exciting game play, I have great conversations with guys and gals from around the world, in the early rounds.  The game gets pretty intense as you progress past round 50. Past round 81, strap on your “big gal” pants because terror, sweat, and arm weariness rule each round---the Dragons, Giants, and Orcs seem endless.

My hat is tipped to the developers. The visuals and sound effects are tremendous. Additionally, these developers answer comments and suggestions provided by the players and continue to improve the game. Thank you Wenkly Studios.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031097518', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 219, 'last_played': 1561691690}
review:
I ended up having to re-install to get it playable for some reason, but since then I've enjoyed the game quite a bit. I also had trouble with the spells for a while, maybe they weren't available yet in single player or maybe I kept using the wrong hand/timing. 

The game is your basic tower defense with several different settings to choose from. Defeat wave after wave after wave of Orcs, the occasional Ogre and Dragon by shooting them with arrows. Shoot enough, get some gold, get a better bow, add some spells to your arrows, shoot some more.  

I haven't been able to get past the 13th wave in single player. If multi-player scales with the number or players it must get crazy by then.
developer_response:
As we speak the game is played by around 200 people so I'm sure It's not like the game does not launch for most people. That does not change the fact that we will do our best to solve your problems with the game so hopefully, you can come and join us in the honorable duty of shooting orcs soon.

Could you do the following steps:
1. Restart computer
2. Verify the integrity of the files

If that does not help could you send us output.log file 
Here is how :  https://steamcommunity.com/app/503770/discussions/0/135513549098112663/

author: {'steamid': '76561197970566201', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 417, 'last_played': 1563661924}
review:
It’s just an okay game. Everything is done competently enough. But there is just not much there and not much reason to invest time in it beyond beating your own high score.
It’s a typical tower defense archery game. The graphics are on the realistic side but there are only a few types of enemy and the animations are all the same and less then inspiring in that you feel like you a shooting a tiny arrow into a large orc because of the weak hit animation. Yes, animation singular. Doesn’t matter where you hit them they are going to react the exactly the same way every time. Makes it feel very shallow and not exactly visceral. And that shallowness extends to the sound too. Just the same thing every time ad nauseum.
The only character progression is the unlocking of spells for your arrows. Your character does rank up with play but it doesn’t appear to have any affect on the power of your shots. You also earn gold that you can use to buy better looking equipment but again it’s just cosmetic. You can upgrade the spells but all that does is lower the cooldown time. Still it’s the only character progress you have so better than nothing I guess.
The bow handling is okay. The trajectory seems too flat and doesn’t seem to change enough with angle and range which makes it feel a bit unrealistic but it’s still fun. I don’t like how the arrows magically appear in your hand with the push of a button. I prefer the QuiVR scheme where you at least have to reach to your shoulder like you pulling an arrow from a quiver. But the ‘instant’ arrows are not unique to this game.
I’ve played the single player quite a bit and can reach the low 20’s by myself but the lack of progression has kept me from investing too much time or even checking out the multiplayer. If I want a one off experience I find Longbow to be more fun and frantic and the leaderboards work. And if I want to feel like I’m investing the time in my character I’ll play QuiVR as at least there is better equipment to unlock and the gameplay itself has more variety and depth. 
Bottom line is that’s it's too shallow to reccomend when there are better options out there.
developer_response:
Thank you for your opinion and some suggestions.

Comments like this tell us what to focus on so we can improve in the future.

We hope that someday you will come back and try the game once again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052509619', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1552074927}
review:
This game is pretty darn cool.  I hope they keep updating it.. it has a lot of potential to be a very cool AAA VR game!

WISHLIST FOR DEV...

- Make some of the Orcs come out to a certain spot and just KEEP throwing Axes at you  until they die.  Right now they feel like drones the way they walk and then stop for one second to throw an axe and then keep right on going.  Make a few of them out for blood and have them just attack and not be so concerned with getting to the gate.

- Maybe give some of the Orcs a Shield?  Would be easy art-wise... and maybe these guys either have to be killed with a headshot only.. OR hit from behind.

Great game though!

author: {'steamid': '76561198124307743', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1655154815}
review:
[h1]Это качественный VR, стрельба только из лука, приятная графика
Это не сюжетная компания, не сражения на мечах, не дает рукам отдохнуть[/h1]
Это очень качественный defense, где Вам предстоит отражать с помощью только лука и стрел волны орков и минибосов в виде гигантов и драконов.
Мультиплеер реализован шикарно, присутствует кастомизация. Одиночная игра ничуть не хуже. Играть можно всей семьей. Помимо весело проведенного времени, неплохо прокачаете руки от постоянной стрельбы и ноги от приседаний, что бы увернуться от летящего в вас топора)
Реализация стрельбы из лука шикарна. На HTC Vive джойстик неплохо вибрирует при натяжении стрелы, что создает неплохой эффект настоящего лука в руке)

author: {'steamid': '76561198001872864', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 389, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1681443923}
review:
I want to be able to recommend this but can't. I'd rate it 2.5/5 stars. You may enjoy it but there are better options.

Areas for improvement:
1. Seems like the multiplayer community is really small - I've only ever seen maybe 10-20 players online at once before. Sometimes not even enough for one game server. 
2. It's really repetitive - you need to grind a lot. It could take hours in one game to beat your old record of number of waves passed. It's just the nature of the game I guess
3. Bow mechanics are a bit clunky. They aren't bad, but I find it hard to shoot fast. Aiming is ok. 
4. There are much better bow games. I haven't played all of them. I can recommend In Death, and I especially like Rec Room for the quests like Golden Trophy and Crimson Cauldron - the bow action in those is amazing and it's free!

Positives:
1. I do feel like playing this once in a while. 
2. If you like tower defense, you might like this
3. If you like grinding through wave after wave of enemies, shooting them with bow and arrow you might like this. 
4. There are definitely people who are serious about this game and have spent hundreds of hours

Bottom line: I can't recommend it because there are better options. To me it gets boring quickly and I don't feel like playing it that often. It's not a bad game though. You might like it.
developer_response:
Hello,

Thanks for the honest opinion. We really appreciate it. So to let you know - VR player base is still small although as for now Elven Assassin is having a solid player base comparing to other multiplayer games.

As the game has Tower Defense style the main core is to defend upcoming waves - we understand that for some of the players it may be not interesting that much. 
About the shooting speed - we saw players spraying arrows so maybe it depends on the headset which you are using or the shooting technique.

Besides that, it's good to hear some good words from you about the game. Opinions like this help us a lot.

We hope that one day you will come back and try the game once again.

Best regards

author: {'steamid': '76561197984546365', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1789, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1518, 'last_played': 1604190601}

author: {'steamid': '76561197982132405', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1529627994}
review:
Meh, of all the VR games I've tried, this one is the most boring. There are a few enemy types, and there's just not much replayability or gameplay. The Lab archery range is probably the same, if not better than this. And that one is free.

I don't want to disincentivize VR games or anything, so I would suggest adding more gameplay features, maybe lower the prices of the gear you can buy, and adding more platforms or movement possibilities.  

Also, it says I only played 12 minutes, but I spent more than half an hour in the game.
developer_response:

There was also an update with Ice spells which advance gameplay bit more.

Tournament mode is heading to the game soon so it may be a good time to take another look at the game and new features.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985564810', 'num_games_owned': 640, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1638238834}
review:
Original "Recommended" Review

Posted: 7 Jun, 2018 @ 9:09pm

EARLY ACCESS REVIEW
This game is mediocre at best. The oculus support is poor unless you have a 360 set up (DEVS: Add 1/4 turning!!) as most towers you can stand in will have you facing a wall. Towers where you face the right way however are ok.

The game is poor. The enemies are boring, the single player is boring and not catered for 1 person. The graphics are average, the progression is boring. However it is fun in multiplayer even with randoms.

The fact that after 2 years of development this is where it is at leaves little to be desired. Get it on sale, I got it for £8 on sale and feel like I overpayed.

The reason this is a recommended review is because despite it's many and obvious flaws, it is still fun for a small blast at times.
----------------------------------

Now, almost a year later. OCULUS SUPPORT!

BUT NO QUARTER TURNING AND THEY SOMEHOW FUCKED UP CONTROLLER ALIGNMENT.

But hey, at least we have tournaments and colourful armour.

I'm done with this POS.

////////////////////
Update 2021, well done you added snap turning after 5? years!

Now the game's outdated and sucks.
developer_response:
Hi!

Thank you for your feedback. 
Sorry to hear that you're not quite happy with the game. 

For a long time we’ve been working on updating all the "under-the-hood" engines, so that we can provide you with better visuals and performance, more-stable networking and improving the publishing process so that it will be easier for us to follow-up with the content updates. 
Fortunately, we are coming back with an update of the content and we will have new maps and mechanics to make the game more interesting! 

Also, you have mentioned problems with controller alignment, is this problem still occurring for you?

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198033624725', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1556134034}

author: {'steamid': '76561198057058810', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1529485436}
review:
EARLY ACCESS REVIEW:

Editing after getting buddy that's also into real life archery into game. This is our new favorite CO-OP VR game to play! With at least 2 people it's now possible to defend areas where eventually becomes impossible due to growing swarms in Single Player. There are a few glitches (ie arrows passing thru enemies but not killing them occasionally, dancing ballerina Trolls, etc) but none of these are game ending. In game COMM's is horrible and honestly they should just let that part go. But if you get on with TS / Discord easily worked around! Hard to believe this is still EA with how good game is now!
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This should be called Elven Archery Exercise because I was sweating after few rounds! This is pretty much what you wished "The LAB" Archery mode was all about. Same basic concept but much, much better graphics and you can teleport around to change your shooting position. THIS GAME iS DESIGNED FOR VR ROOM SET UP WITH MINIMUM DIMENSIONS AND STORE PAGE REALLY SHOULD SAY THIS!! This is so you can duck and weave from attacks. 

This is begging to be multi-player as single player it's almost impossible to cover all the paths the invading Orcs take to get to your village. I have not tried it in Multi-player yet...but it's challenging in single player. There are Boss monsters (Giant Troll, dragon, etc) that change up the mix. Unlike most VR Archery games, this 1 also fights back (ie  Orcs that throw axes at your sniping positions, fire breathing dragos, etc) so there are level ending threats to your archer as well as the invasion of your village / city. 

The bow and arrow controls are MUCH better than most games that are already out of Early Access. For the folks I've seen in the Games forums having trouble...try looking at the game's setting option? There are ways to modify how your bow works. Most important to me was the draw is MUCH better than many games were you end up smacking controllers together in frustration to get dam arrow notched and drawn before you die. Simple notch and draw basically as fast as you can do it.

There are some game hanging bugs. Literally the 1st time tried to boot the game it hung up forever loading. Most of the bugs I've encountered you can fix by exiting back to SteamVR and then exiting the game. Then reload. There has only been 1 that caused me to exit VR and completely reload my Vive system. I have never had to crash my PC to get out of game lockup. But none of these are enough that didnt have fun with game. I hope the developers keep at this game as it has A LOT of potential!

author: {'steamid': '76561197980992465', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1528181787}

author: {'steamid': '76561198298666088', 'num_games_owned': 58, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 4571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1848, 'last_played': 1574326788}
review: Great game, very intuitive for beginners but if you want to master it, you will have to pour many hours honning your archery skills. One of the most entretaining there are out there to compete against friends if you have company IRL.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001807994', 'num_games_owned': 478, 'num_reviews': 306, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1645322582}
review:
It's not the greatest game ever, but it's functionally fun for $15. there's a progression system, three different maps, co-op (have not played yet), spells, and more or less anything you'd expect from a game like this. I'll say the first map has some wonky defense points and forces you to move physically in order to use the space. This might be good with a full room vr, but with limited space, it's not convienient to reposition. it would be nice if you could move with the touchpad a little. 

All in all, it's worth getting, I got this game for the specific setting, the reviews, and the fact I saw pvp deathmatch in it as well, that could be fun.  It's a well fleshed out game with good playability, worth every dime.

author: {'steamid': '76561198191209455', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1626062288}
review:
Great game! simple and yet plenty of fun. The accuracy of the bow is spot on aside from a few misses but could have been from my accuracy. A good fun challenge with the giant troll and the axe throwing orc. The spells are a great addition to help improve your score, and also good that they're upgradable. Not only did I have fun with it but my family also  has loads of fun shooting arrows at incoming orcs. 
I did have one glitch of the giant troll getting stuck in front of a tower in the elven village and spinning around, I would like to get a little bit more gold during the levels, and maybe more maps.
Other than that. Great game for hours of fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113088650', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 2323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 960, 'last_played': 1648941707}
review:
This is easily one of my favorite VR games and the best wave shooter IMHO.

As a single player game, it's solid, but truly shines in multiplayer.  Playing with up to 3 other players in co-op is a blast, and PVP is a great workout. 

This game remains engaging because you can level up and get better spells, which in turn helps you to get through higher waves.  

Hopefully this game continues to get more updates, including new levels, but as it stands, it's a must have.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048712425', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1523634914}
review:
回合射箭塔防遊戲，只有弓箭能用，等級提升後可以學習魔法來使用，到關卡後期會非常的困難
敵人會對玩家反擊，要一直閃躲+射箭

畫面可圈可點，飛龍和食人魔會跑到面前毆人，有點震撼感

這款遊戲可以連線合作，也能連線PVP，對戰的手感做得非常好，不管是射到人還是被射到
然後很奇妙的是：亞服非常多韓國人，不管進哪房都是聽到韓語，我到現在還沒聽過其他語言(包括中文英文)
而且極高比率妹子，是韓國妹子，有興趣還不快買來射一波？
連線相當穩定，到現在還沒有斷線的問題，語音也非常清晰流暢

當然也有缺點
我是使用Vive，弓箭右手指勾弦的部分有偏差，箭會搭在類似手把上方的位置，而不是手的位置
對於現實中有練習弓箭的人而言，卡暗卡點會導致射線偏下
這點請注意

除此之外沒什麼問題，也不會有甚麼空間限制問題
所以空間夠大，可以搬張椅子直接站出平台掌握至高點來射
物理性的飛天外掛

小遊戲而已，殺時間不錯
推薦度：★★★☆☆

author: {'steamid': '76561198198044978', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 25146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7678, 'last_played': 1667007284}
review: I have to say that this game is the best archer game by far.  The bow mechanics are fantastic and if you read about people disliking the bow then they didn't look into the settings of the game or isn't holding the bow correctly.  Currently I have 123 hours on this and spend 90% of my time playing this game alone.  Found 17 people that are also good at this game and can make it to ~120 waves (then we usually quit bc its late and/or someone has to leave).  New multiplayer PvP is awesome.  The devs listen to players and incorporate comments from players into the game.  Can't see any game getting so good to ever take me away from this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198815155599', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 766, 'last_played': 1647638225}
review:
JUEGAZO! Sin más, una temática muy lograda, el tema de los arqueros es muy inversivo, el modo multijugador es inigualable, hay 2 modos multijugador, uno de todos contra todos, que consiste en matar a otros usuarios, y el modo normal de juego, que es entre varios jugadores ir matando a los orcos para que no entren en tu castillo.

Best regards

author: {'steamid': '76561198405253036', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 59495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 52, 'playtime_at_review': 16965, 'last_played': 1712405068}
review:
Самые играбельные лучники ! Должны быть у каждого обладателя шлема и хоть когда-то желающего пострелять из лука.
Сказал бы в стиле варкрафта, графа другая но по обстоятельствам вы лучник/и (Если кооп, а по другому в эту игру играть не так весело и как же без спортивного духа настрелять больше всех ?) на башнях и не даете проникнуть в вашу цитадель, город, деревню, руины - оркам, драконам и ограм !
"На город наших союзников напали враги..." И мы теперь спешим на помощь и учимся стрелять из лука, а со временем нам открываются и волшебные силы (Стрелы) наподобии вызова метеор дождя, стрелы-взрывчатки и других.
Играем в неё каждый день, фитнес игра для похудения))) 
Как уже и говорил пока самые простые лучники с хорошей подачей стрельбы из лука по оркам. Рекомендую !
P.S из минусов: на некоторых картах есть точки, на которых тебе приходится разворачиваться в противоположную сторону и смотреть в неудобную зону...
В других лучниках (КуиВР) с этим просто - перемещаясь на другие зоны тебя всегда поворачивает в сторону каньона, по которому идут враги и это очень удобно. Жду когда добавят сюда повороты или добавят в настройки такую возможность.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044204581', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 368, 'last_played': 1624753761}
review: Very basic but addictive. playing with online withrandoms is great. MP spells are not working with the beta update. Still much fun and good exercise with realistic arrow physics and dodging enemies.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007263093', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1971, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 552, 'last_played': 1613333515}
review: Easily the best VR game I have purchased since buying an Oculus. For 6quid, at time of writing have clocked over 7 hours and enjoying it more and more. Whole family is addicted. Only fault would be the layout of some towers is better suited to a 3 sensor layout and not really playable with a 2... but I would consider that a hardware fault and not software. Easily fixed by playing the Human Village level and staying in the default tower.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108164874', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 208312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 319, 'playtime_at_review': 39844, 'last_played': 1711751486}
review:
UPDATE #2:  Wow! This game just keeps getting better.  Buy this now. Join and enjoy playing co-op with an awesome set of fellow VR Orc slayers.  The new Ice Spells and Revive Arrow add cool features and novel attack strategies.  These developers really listen to the players and have done a great job.


UPDATE:  No one has the right to have this much fun. The multi-player mode is truly a gem.  Unbelievable fun and a workout---my Fitbit groans after ten minutes. You better be prepared to duck axes from every corner of the map. You need teamwork to get to the higher waves but it is such an enjoyable and addictive experience. OPT out of Betas to reliably find server games; but, Asia, Europe, or US---someone is always there or will join you shortly. You will need help if you want to live to fight the Orcs, defeat that fire breathing Mother of Dragons, the armored Giant, and the hordes of axe throwing Orcs.

Wow!!! What a game.  Buy it now, you will be pleased.
This is why I bought a WMR headset.---you are immersed and need to defend your castle---and yourself.
I move for better shots, I duck to save my life, and I sweat because it is hours of great exercise.
.......and my wife loves it.  She asks to play. And what an immersive experience for her—she never wants to lose at anything and truly panics in the face of death. Yesterday, she ducked an axe, lost her balance, felt like she was falling out of the tower---I barely caught her before she hit the floor.  Her only statement, "get me up, I need to shoot, the dragon is coming."
But it is about a bow and arrow challenge. And it is fun.  My other PC game addictions with bows and arrows are lonely.
Once the Orcs start coming, you fear being overrun: you fear the flying axe: you fear the giant; and, you absolutely fear that fire breathing dragon. He burns me every time; I will get him soon!!
As the challenge levels rise, you cannot waste arrows, so you need to prioritize your targets or be overwhelmed.  Each time my castle is burned to the ground by the hordes, I swear to do better, and start again.
I tried multi-player when I was just starting. I apologize to the team I joined but they were amazing at guarding me and annihilating the attackers.  I have not found active US servers in the last 2 days so it miss that a bit but this game is fun just for single player action and the exercise value.
To the development team:  Thanks so much for your efforts, I have not had this much gaming fun in years.  And imagine, you have my wife playing and telling me what a good investment this WMR system is—I usually only hear that about purses or shoes.  As a minor comment, I think the arrow needs to line up on the other side of the bow BUT who cares, I have Orcs to kill!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007597769', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1084, 'last_played': 1612468726}

author: {'steamid': '76561198086578339', 'num_games_owned': 219, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1523168137}
review:

Would be nice if you had the ability to offset the bow and arrow?  Playing with a WMR controller, the bow leans too far forward. Other than that, really fun game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971626425', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 10557, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1284, 'last_played': 1674359811}
review: This is a fun game. It works fairly well on my Oculus Rift - but is probably meant for a 360 setup. On the Oculus you will find you need to turn your body around - and in turn you won't face your sensors. This leads to a jittery bow and arrow so you can't kill the enemies when you need to 100% of the time. That said, I highly recommend it, it is one of the better bow and arrow games for VR. The only recommendation I have is for the team to add the ability to turn your body 1/4 turn with the joy stick so us Oculus users can always face the sensors while facing the enemy at the same time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158668078', 'num_games_owned': 23, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 22239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9095, 'last_played': 1649686088}
review:
기록상 150시간 플레이.. 레벨 90이 된 유저가 평가합니다.

현재 VR방에서는 가장 효자게임이라고 생각합니다. 체험관 사장님들께서는 필구 효자게임

HTC 바이브나 오큘을 가지고 있는 당신.. 뭘사야 할지 고민이시라면 강력 추천합니다(한X충 필구)

이 게임은 하면 할수록 자아도취에 빠지기 쉬운 게임입니다.

시작 전 한조 대기중을 외치기 시작하며 용의 눈으로 봐라라는 등 알 수 없는 소리를 하면서 게임을 
하게됩니다.

가끔 멀티시 체험관 분들과 할 때에는 "류요 와가 테키오 쿠라에!!"를 외쳐주세요 당신의 병신력을 

체험관 분들에게 뽐낼 수 있는 절호의 기회입니다.

류오 와가 테키오 쿠라에를 모르신다면 인터넷에서 찾아보시고 기술을 익힌 후 플레이 하시길 추천합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011319345', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1548064165}
review:
I haven't played this game for too long, but my goodness it is freaking sweet! I love how you can change positions in game to take out as many of those ghastly orcs! And that massive Ogre! OMG! The accuracy of the bow is spot on and enjoyed the short time I have had in game thoroughly. Multiplayer is great, it was nice to kick some orc butt in a group. 

Thanks Devs, I'll be playing some more later :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198145850461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1512173945}

Hi!

Sorry to hear that. 

A lot has changed since you published your comment. We have enhanced visuals, improved performance,  increased network stability and added some new content. Maybe you should give the game a second chance.

Moreover, in the future, we plan to add more interesting content like new maps and mechanics. 

Our player base is active and still growing, make sure to check all the regions (US/EU/Asia) while you are playing multiplayer games.

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

review:

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198091573845', 'num_games_owned': 1052, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1510769683}
review:
This game is quite fun to play.  Its like Longbow in the lab, with spells and the enemies can attack you, or throw stuff at you to kill you.  

The bow and arrow is a little different than the lab, doesnt quite have the sound effects as good as Valve.  But there is more game here, and you can play in multiplayer which can be alot of fun.

review: Enjoyable bow and arrow/tower defense game. I know there are quite a few of these so the concept isn't necessarily original, but the game does work, has a nice single and multi player mode, includes a shop and "skill tree" that depends on your level. Gives you a reason to keep playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032881827', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1508908752}
review:
This is one of my favorite games.

For Oculus users, there are two versions: the Steam version and the Oculus store version. I own both, they both run with Oculus, and they are different. I've tried the game with both two sensors and four sensors. The Steam version is always more up-to-date and has more features. In order to describe the other differences, first we need to describe some game details.

In this game you play an elven archer represented by gloves, a bow and arrow, and a helmet, who mans several guardposts in front of a village. You defend the village from waves of Orcs and other creatures; it's tower defence. Every creature who breaks through (makes it to the village) counts against the village's HP, and you lose when the village has zero HP. Orcs and creatures spawn from various entry points, usually doorways or caves. Depending on where the Orcs are, how many are coming from each door, etc, different guardposts are better than others to defend the village.

In Elven Assassin, unlike in SteamVR Home, you can't teleport to just any spot in the navigable playspace, you have to physically walk there. There are multiple navigable playspaces (aka different platforms and towers) which you can teleport to, but your position in your real playspace determines your position in the virtual playspace. This game becomes way way easier if you can expand your real playspace, because a lot more firing angles become available. If your playspace is too small, you won't be able to fire around a wall, or shoot point blank straight down at enemies. This is true in both Oculus and Steam versions.

I found that the room I initially had my Oculus set up in was too small to get full enjoyment from this game. I moved my setup into the largest room in my house. When setting up your playspace boundaries, you may be tempted to "fudge" the edges, or try to get the largest possible area even though the Oculus software doesn't recommend your setup. When you get to the edges of this area, where the playspace is only covered by one sensor, you will lose tracking, especially if you are facing away from the sensor. I found out by accident that most games work fine when your sensors are not placed in the recommended configuration: you can put one sensor to the front and one sensor to the right for example. You still lose tracking sometimes, but you get a bigger area to play in, which means better angles; and you may lose tracking at different spots.

The direction you face is different. When you teleport to a different platform, you automatically face some direction. In the Steam version, this appears to be whatever direction you were previously facing (usually the wrong way). In the Oculus version, you are automatically re-pointed in the direction(s) the tower was intended to provide coverage over. So you can stay facing the Oculus sensors, which you want.

Additionally, in the Oculus version, you can use the Oculus menu "Reset View in VR" button to adjust both which direction is forward and where the center of the platform is located. "Reset View in VR" has no effect in the Steam version: I really miss the ability to recenter the platform: I can walk through a wall into a useless room, but I can't walk over to the edge of the roof and fire down at the Orcs as they march through the gate. Nor do I fully understand the particular playspace angles chosen in the Steam version. To summarize, in the Oculus version, you can change how the virtual playspace and the real playspace align; in the Steam version you can't.

One of the biggest differences between the two: the Steam version has more content and more updates. You can play both "Elven Village" and "Human Village" in Steam, but only "Elven Village" in Oculus. And the graphics seem respectably nicer in the Steam version. And the arrow mechanics are different ("improved").

Available playspaces are highlighted with blue cylinders. You teleport to a playspace by firing an arrow at its blue cylinder. In the Oculus version, a well-aimed shot through the blue cylinder does not teleport me about 5-15% of the time. This is tolerable and I expect it now, but it does cost you a number of Orcs when the teleport is time critical.

In the Elven Village scenario, there are four platforms. The "forward tower", the "high tower", the center pagoda "guardpost", and the rear "auxiliary" tower. In the Steam version, the guardpost is a small ~5x5' platform in the center of everything, with a low fence around it (good for ducking behind, and firing shots through), and four corner pillars supporting a roof (the pillars are good for dodging behind to avoid axes). You have a clear view in every direction, at every spawning point, and also the only straight shot at the door (last ditch). In the Oculus version, the guardpost has a wooden wall on the "forward" side, and you are automatically oriented to face the gate (the "rear"). You don't have a good shot in the forward direction, and if you step out around the edge of the guardpost wall to get one, you lose tracking. While the wall is nice because Orcs can't attack you through it, I prefer not having the wall. The other guardposts are largely unchanged.

Another minor difference is the Steam version "laser pointer" finger guides point at a really weird angle that probably makes sense for the Vive controller. This isn't a big deal for me though, things seems to work correctly in the game. And you have to click the thumbstick while choosing a spell, instead of just moving the thumbstick. And "B" is pause instead of "Left Menu". On the Oculus version (I didn't really check on the Steam version), the item descriptions contains some bad English.

All in all (hey devs!), I really wish I could recenter the playspace in the Steam version; And there are all these windows and rooms I wish I could go in (especially that one next to the "auxiliary" tower), but can't.

The devs do say that the Steam version doesn't officially support Oculus, and the game does only get the "Vive" badge from Steam, so I guess it isn't guaranteed the Steam version will work with Oculus, but it does work for me.

Using four sensors (and really, three, probably) makes rear tracking (360/room scale) reliable on the Oculus, although you always run into reduced tracking at the playspace boundaries (which I find myself hugging).

Despite the Steam version being better in almost every other way, I will recommend the Oculus version for two-sensor Oculus setups, and as something worth considering for setups with more than two sensors: don't underestimate the power of re-aligning your playspace!

author: {'steamid': '76561198281851673', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1585578810}
review:
Wave形式の弓撃ちゲームです。

グラフィックや音楽のセンスは良くある海外のバタ臭い感じで人を選ぶ上に、
UIも微妙に使いづらく、弓の操作性もイマイチで、ボリュームも少なく、
レベルデザインも結構稚拙で、ただ弓を連射するだけなので盛り上がりに欠けます。
弓の防衛戦だったらThe Labでいいんじゃないか？という気がしなくもありませんし、
その通りです。シングルプレイの範囲では…

このゲームの真価は協力プレイにあります。嬉しい事にアジアサーバーが用意されていて、
やたらとアジア圏のVR漫画喫茶的な場所に導入されているようでして、
信じられないほど部屋が立っていて、本当にいつでも最大4人の協力対戦ができます。
これほどマッチングするVRゲームは私はrecroom位しか知りません(2017/10月現在)
だったらrecroomで良いんじゃないか？と言われればそうなんですけど、
プラスアルファとして買ってみるのも悪くはないかなーって思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561197995570374', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1583884292}
review: A LOT of fun. Aiming is challenging but not overly so. Orcs aren't too bright but the flying threats mix it up some.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013495934', 'num_games_owned': 677, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 135, 'last_played': 1587705831}
review:
좋은 게임입니다

+ 쉬우면서도 깊이있는 활 조준 시스템

+ 날아오는 도끼 덕분에 단순히 디펜스라는 느낌이 들지 않음

+ 아시아/유럽/미국으로 서버가 나뉘어져 있어서, 핑차이 없이 게임을 즐길수 있음

+ 게임 센터에서 이 게임을 자주틀어주다보니, 놀러온 사람들 방에 들어가서 같이 게임할수 있음, 따라서 멀티플레이 인원이 어느정도 꾸준히 있는듯.

++ 낮은 가격

author: {'steamid': '76561197960695529', 'num_games_owned': 299, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3081, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 828, 'last_played': 1705259586}
review:
I haven't played this game a ton yet but so far it's incredibly fun. The developer released a new map recently, so I have hopes he will continue pushing forward on game development. It's absolutely incredible how realistic it feels wielding the bow. Not to mention, it's an awesome work out at the same time. I recommend wearing a bandana or something to contain sweat lol..I was getting tired around wave 10 but now I don't feel it until around wave 15. Going to have some buff shoulders if I keep playing this hah!

Pros: 
Awesome work out
Realistic Feel
Graphics are really good
Multiplayer is awesome... if you find a game
Singleplayer is also great, you can see your body strength progress and skill progress each time you hop in.
You can purchase spells and level them up to decrease cooldowns which each bit helps as you progress.

Cons: 
It would be nice if the equipment you buy actually had stats instead of being just for looks. For example, orcs throw axes that you have to physically duck or avoid, it would be nice that if you were wearing the expensive gear maybe you only get disoriented for 3 seconds or something. Also, the later waves 40+ are incredibly tough and +.5 dmg would be nice.
Needs more players online for multiplayer.(Please buy this game =D)

author: {'steamid': '76561197966667286', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1505092821}
review: This game is early access, so maybe it will change a lot, but it looks like it has been out for a year already. It is basically a tower defense game where you play the tower. The enemies follow a pretty simple path and you have to kill them before they get to a certain point. Once in a while they will throw an axe at you that you have to dodge or it kills you with one hit. There are a few things you get like fire arrows, but the mechanic for using them is kind of awkward. Overall it feels like you've seen all the game has to offer in just a few rounds of gameplay. The bow and arrow mechanics themselves do work well and feel good though. If you don't have any other games it would be OK but there many games that have a bow in them that offer more fun than this one.
developer_response:
Hi!

Thank you for your feedback! 

A lot has changed since your review. We have enhanced visuals, improved performance,  increased network stability and added some new content. 

Besides, we will be adding more new content in the future like new maps up to 8 players, new enemies and fresh mechanics. 

We also highly recommend checking multiplayer mode. It contains co-op and dynamic PvP deathmatch. 

If you are still into VR, please consider checking the game once again and giving us your current opinion. We would love to hear it.

Best regards,
Kamil, Wenkly Studio

author: {'steamid': '76561198097641030', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 1207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1626898116}
review:
Simple go to great wave shooter. If you've played  quivr and liked the original then your going to love this. Takes all the good points from the first quivr game and makes them better. I would still say that quivr has the best bow mechanics, but after a short play you will forget about that. 

Mind boggling simple archer shooting game that you will be drawn back to time and time again. Especially if you have finds that like bow games.

Dev could be a bit more active but at least he is still there

author: {'steamid': '76561198037834322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 907, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 835, 'last_played': 1507771070}

author: {'steamid': '76561198023470357', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1051, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1670465905}
review:
Having done archery in the past this is an amazing game to hone both your arm strength if done for extended time and situational awareness and predictive shooting. The first time a boss showed up it dawned on me the real size of monsters like that. And if you immerse yourself you become motivated by your allies and the villagers depending on you.

The one downside is that multiplayer games seem quite rare.

I would recommend this game of you have the space to play it. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198010400142', 'num_games_owned': 577, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 591, 'last_played': 1683438890}
review:
One of the first VR games I bought and I still play it for a good quick game and work out. Simple enough to pick up quickly and challenging enough to replay. Just recently started playing multiplayer and using the spells and it's a blast! Bow mechanics feel great, aiming feels great, getting hit in the face by a giant ogre... feels great!
10/10
